    • Method Detail

      • initialRate

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder initialRate(float rate)
        Rate used until an adaptive one calculated. 0.0001 means 0.01% of traces. Defaults to 1.0

      • id

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder id(String id)
        Stable name to use for this node in ZooKeeper groups and elections, ex. "cluster@host:port". Defaults to a UUID.

      • basePath

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder basePath(String basePath)
        Base path in ZooKeeper for the sampler to use. Defaults to "zipkin"

      • updateFrequency

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder updateFrequency(int updateFrequency)
        Frequency in seconds which to update the store and sample rate. Defaults to 30

      • windowSize

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder windowSize(int windowSize)
        Seconds of request rate data to base sample rate on. Defaults to 1800 (30 minutes)

      • sufficientWindowSize

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder sufficientWindowSize(int sufficientWindowSize)
        Seconds of request rate data to gather before calculating sample rate. Defaults to 600 (10 minutes)

      • outlierThreshold

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.Builder outlierThreshold(int outlierThreshold)
        Seconds to see outliers before updating sample rate. Defaults to 300 (5 minutes)

      • build

        public ZooKeeperCollectorSampler build(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client)
        Parameters:
        client - must be started, and will not be closed on ZooKeeperCollectorSampler.close()
